item.title: Npc Shoutout text
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2244) { //Npc ID! npcs[NPCID].updateRequired = true; npcs[NPCID].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[NPCID].textUpdate = "your text here that will be shouted :)"; }

That should work. If that doesn’t, post the method you are adding it in.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Shoutout text
item.dc:creator: @teh_genevoix teh genevoix
item.description:
@teh_genevoix wrote:

i got this

NPCHandler.java:602: illegal start of type if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2244) { //Npc ID! ^ NPCHandler.java:602: ']' expected if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2244) { //Npc ID! ^ NPCHandler.java:602: ')' expected if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2244) { //Npc ID! ^ NPCHandler.java:602: illegal start of type if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2244) { //Npc ID! ^ NPCHandler.java:602: ';' expected if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2244) { //Npc ID! ^
when i put this in
if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2244) { //Npc ID! npcs[NPCID].updateRequired = true; npcs[NPCID].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[NPCID].textUpdate = "your text here that will be shouted "; }

item.title: Npc Shoutout text
item.dc:creator: @Kakapo Kakapo
item.description:
@Kakapo wrote:

Even though its my base, I dont know if this will work. Try it

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2244) { //Npc ID!
                            npcs[NPCID].updateRequired = true;
                            npcs[NPCID].textUpdateRequired = true;
                                npcs[NPCID].textUpdate = "your text here that will be shouted ";
                            }

item.title: Npc Shoutout text
item.dc:creator: @teh_genevoix teh genevoix
item.description:
@teh_genevoix wrote:

so like this

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2244) { //Npc ID!
if ((1) <= 3) //time delay, time between they say your shout text.
{
npcs[NPCID].updateRequired = true;
npcs[NPCID].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[NPCID].textUpdate = “your text here that will be shouted :)”;
}

item.title: Npc Shoutout text
item.dc:creator: @teh_genevoix teh genevoix
item.description:
@teh_genevoix wrote:

i have a tricky problem for me i was searching how to do a npc shoutout above the head text i found the code

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2244) { //Npc ID!
if (misc.random2(1) <= 3) //time delay, time between they say your shout text.
{
npcs[NPCID].updateRequired = true;
npcs[NPCID].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[NPCID].textUpdate = “your text here that will be shouted :)”;
}

and i put it in and i got nothing back i was using lummy guide as a test did i do anything wrong and i put it in the npchandler.java class

Read full topic
